attributes.action: Give an allowance via Council Tax for people serving their country
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With all the allowances given to people in this country what about giving an allowance to the guys protecting it and serving in our Armed Forces, We believe they should have a council tax cut when they are away on deployment to help their families. It's something surely our govenrment should give them, they give it to people who put nothing into society so why not thoses who enable us to live safely.
